00001 #include "TDPGeneratorFactory.h"
00002 #include "MaxTimeDiffDPGenerator.h"
00003 #include <iostream>
00004 #include <vector>
00005 #include <cmath>
00006 using std::cout;
00007 using std::endl;
00008 
00009 void MaxTimeDiffDPGenerator::ProcessPulses(const TSetupData* setup,const std::string& detector, 
00010                   const AnalysedPulseList* fast_pulses, const AnalysedPulseList* slow_pulses,
00011                   DetectorPulseList& output){
00012 
00013           AnalysedPulseList::const_iterator fastPulseIter = fast_pulses->begin();
00014           AnalysedPulseList::const_iterator slowPulseIter = slow_pulses->begin();
00015           AnalysedPulseList::const_iterator finalFastPulseIter = fast_pulses->end();
00016           AnalysedPulseList::const_iterator finalSlowPulseIter = slow_pulses->end();
00017 
00018           std::vector<AnalysedPulseList::const_iterator> pulseIters;
00019           pulseIters.push_back(fastPulseIter);
00020           pulseIters.push_back(slowPulseIter);
00021 
00022           std::vector<AnalysedPulseList::const_iterator> finalIters;
00023           finalIters.push_back(finalFastPulseIter);
00024           finalIters.push_back(finalSlowPulseIter);
00025 
00026           // Loop through both TAnalysedPulse vectors until they are both finished
00027           // NB with this alogirthm this can be extended to more than 2
00028           double min_time = 999999; // something large
00029           double pulse_time;
00030           while (pulseIters.size() > 0) {
00031 
00032             // Find out which of the next fast or slow pulsees happened next
00033             for (unsigned int b = 0; b < pulseIters.size(); ++b) {
00034               pulse_time = (*pulseIters[b])->GetTime() * 1e-6; // convert to ms       
00035               min_time = std::min(min_time, pulse_time);
00036 
00037             }
00038 
00039             // Now go through and find all the pulses that are within a certain time of this
00040             double time_difference = 0.1; // 0.1 ms
00041             TAnalysedPulse* fast_pulse = NULL;
00042             TAnalysedPulse* slow_pulse = NULL;
00043             for (unsigned int b = 0; b < pulseIters.size(); ++b) {
00044 
00045               TAnalysedPulse* pulse = *(pulseIters[b]);
00046               double pulse_time = pulse->GetTime() * 1e-6; // convert to ms
00047 
00048               if (std::fabs(pulse_time - min_time) < time_difference) {
00049                 if ( TSetupData::IsFast(pulse->GetDetName())) {
00050                   if(Debug()) cout<<"Fast? " << pulse->GetDetName() << std::endl;
00051                   fast_pulse = pulse;
00052                 } else if ( TSetupData::IsSlow(pulse->GetDetName()))  {
00053                   if(Debug()) cout<<"Slow? " << pulse->GetDetName() << std::endl;
00054                   slow_pulse = pulse;
00055                 }
00056 
00057                 ++(pulseIters[b]); // increment the iterator because we used the pulse
00058               }
00059             }
00060             TDetectorPulse* det_pulse = new TDetectorPulse(fast_pulse, slow_pulse, detector); // Create the TDetectorPulse
00061             output.push_back(det_pulse);
00062             if(Debug()){
00063                 cout<<"Created a TDetectorPulse with:\n";
00064                 cout<<"Fast Pulse: " << det_pulse->GetFastPulseTime() * 1e-6 << std::endl;
00065                 cout<< "Slow Pulse: " << det_pulse->GetSlowPulseTime() * 1e-6 << std::endl;
00066                 cout<< std::endl;
00067             }
00068 
00069             //Delete the iterators to finished banks. Go through in reverse to
00070             //avoid invalidation problems
00071             for (int b = pulseIters.size()-1; b >= 0; --b) {
00072               if (pulseIters[b] == finalIters[b]){
00073                 pulseIters.erase(pulseIters.begin() + b);
00074                 finalIters.erase(finalIters.begin() + b);
00075               }  
00076             } // for (int b -reversed)        
00077           } // end for
00078 }
00079 
00080 ALCAP_TDP_GENERATOR(MaxTimeDiff);
